content: this is a very versatile easy pattern it is designed so that the end user can use whatever weight yarn they prefer from size 1 to size 5 it is designed to fill the needs of infants to adults pattern lists hook gauge and instructions based on size and yarn weight desired from fine 2 to super bulky 6 preemie to mens pattern requires 1 skein each of 2 different colors regardless of yarn weight and size made which will make 1 or more hats this pattern link also provides instructions to matching hat ravelry link to matching hat can be found here 1 hat pattern is also available on jo-ann 2 site hat designed for multiple gauges 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crochet-hat--mitts-mitts-lw1564 2 http //www joann com/joann/catalog/projectdetail jsp projectflag=true&catid=&prodid=xprd1036883&subcatname=crochet
